title: Project Millet
description: Developing a ROS-based autonomous drone utilizing a Pixhawk 6x for precise agricultural applications. This ongoing project focuses on implementing robust PID control for stable flight and targeted payload delivery.

modalContent.value: Developing a ROS-based autonomous drone utilizing a Pixhawk 6x for precise agricultural applications. This ongoing project focuses on implementing robust PID control for stable flight and targeted payload delivery, aiming to enhance farming efficiency.
